divs: Sighting DetailsHi Peoples. Back in 2008 I was experimenting with a camera connected to my pc running some security software. When checking the previous nights footage I was surprised and a little scared to find it had recorded some strange beams. There are several very unusual things of note. The first beam in the video looks to be going straight through a concrete tiled porch roof. It is also interesting to see that the beams did not illuminate the area whatsoever. The area is not well lit as it is only illuminated by 4 infrared led's mounted on the b&w camera. Please note the time jumps as the software is only set to record movement. The red lines make a box that the software is set to exclude movement such as plants. I have included a still daytime image to give a better idea of the area. At the top corner is part of the roof structure. Comments are very much welcome. I am at a loss as to what it was.. any ideas?????
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Perth
There were no other sightings in Perth on or around June 26th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Strange searchlight recorded by home security camera
